words.tran_cn: 复兴；复权；恢复正常生活
使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状

trans.tran_cn: 使(身体)康复, 使复职, 使恢复名誉, 使复原
trans.tran_en: to make people think that someone or something is good again after a period when people had a bad opinion of them
